description:
Franklin is a paramedic and martial arts student. He's also straight and has a long-term girlfriend. When I approached him initially I was certain he wouldn't be interested in any kind of nude work. Fortunately, he's not at all shy!
This guy has the most stunning eyes and a very handsome face. The only thing I didn't like about him was the fact that he shaves his chest — you can tell by his arms and legs that he is hairy and I would have loved to have seen his furry chest in its natural state. Unfortunately, hair takes a long time to grow back and I wanted to film him sooner rather than later!
The greatest thing about Franklin is that, unlike most straight guys, he was not at all hesitant to show off his sexy, hairy asshole...
title: Franklin
